divs: Sighting Detailswaiting at a red light in downtown des plaines when I looked up, and saw a huge bright ball of light appear from no where and then "fall" from the sky with extreem speed toward the ground and behind buildings and trees.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Des Plaines
There were no other sightings in Des Plaines on or around August 3rd 2012
Summary: Huge Ball of Light appeared out of no where from the sky then shoots downward toward the ground with extreem speed.
